data.text: Mise nya si gblɔm Yehowa le na mi, O Israel ƒe aƒe
Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Dukɔ siawo ƒe kɔnyinyiwo nye yaka.
Wotsɔa klosalo kple sika fana ɖe eŋuti.
Wotsɔa gatagbadzɛ klãnɛ ɖe enɔƒe be magamu o.
O Yehowa, ame aɖeke mele abe wò ene o;
Ame kae li si agbe wò bubu,
Wo katã wonye susumanɔsitɔwo kple numanyalawo.
Wotsɔa klosalo si woƒo gbabɛ la tsoa Tarsis
Ke Yehowa koe nye nyateƒe ƒe Mawu,
“Gblɔ nya sia na wo, ‘mawu siawo, esiwo mewɔ dziƒo kple anyigba o la atsrɔ̃ le anyigba dzi kple dziƒoa te.’ ”
Ke Mawue wɔ anyigba kple eƒe ŋusẽ;
Ne eɖe gbe la, tsi siwo le dziƒowo tea gbe
Amegbetɔwo katã nye movitɔwo
Nu maɖinuwo kple alɔmeɖenuwo wonye,
Ke ame si nye Yakob ƒe gome la,
Miƒo miaƒe nunɔamesiwo nu ƒu
Elabena ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Baba nam le abi si mexɔ la ta.
Wogbã nye agbadɔ eye wolã eƒe kawo.
Alẽkplɔlawo nye movitɔwo
Ƒu to anyi, ɣli aɖe ɖi, ƒu to anyi, egbɔna,
O Yehowa, menya be amegbetɔ
Yehowa, ɖɔm ɖo, gake kple afiatsotso nyui,
Trɔ wò dɔmedzoe helĩhelĩ la kɔ ɖe dukɔ siwo menya wò o
